Mewdeko Docs
Edit this page

Class StreamRoleService

Manages stream role assignments based on user streaming status and additional configurable conditions within guilds.

Inheritance
object
StreamRoleService
Implements
INService
IUnloadableService

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

StreamRoleService(DiscordSocketClient, DbService, EventHandler, Mewdeko)

Initializes a new instance of the StreamRoleService.

Declaration
public StreamRoleService(DiscordSocketClient client, DbService db, EventHandler eventHandler, Mewdeko bot)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client used to access guild and user information.
DbService db

The database service for storing and retrieving stream role settings.
EventHandler eventHandler

Event handler for capturing and responding to guild member updates.
Mewdeko bot

The bot instance for initializing service with current guild configurations.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

ApplyListAction(StreamRoleListType, IGuild, AddRemove, ulong, string)

Adds or removes a user to/from a whitelist or blacklist for stream role management, and rescans users if successful.

Declaration
public Task<bool> ApplyListAction(StreamRoleListType listType, IGuild guild, AddRemove action, ulong userId, string userName)
Parameters
Type Name Description
StreamRoleListType listType

Specifies whether to modify the whitelist or blacklist.
IGuild guild

The guild where the action is taking place.
AddRemove action

Specifies whether to add or remove the user from the list.
ulong userId

The ID of the user to add or remove.
string userName

The name of the user to add or remove.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation, containing a boolean indicating the success of the action.

| Edit this page View Source

StopStreamRole(IGuild, bool)

Stops the stream role management in a guild, optionally cleaning up by removing the stream role from all users.

Declaration
public Task StopStreamRole(IGuild guild, bool cleanup = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild to stop stream role management in.
bool cleanup

Whether to clean up by removing the stream role from all users.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
